context: Robinhood saw explosive growth during pandemic as retail trading surged. The commission-free pioneer added millions of accounts as stimulus checks and stay-at-home orders drove trading activity.

competitors.name: E*TRADE
competitors.notes: Online broker acquired by Morgan Stanley in 2020

competitors.name: TD Ameritrade
competitors.notes: Major discount broker acquired by Charles Schwab

competitors.name: Charles Schwab
competitors.notes: Largest retail broker, eliminated commissions in 2019

competitors.name: Fidelity
competitors.notes: Major broker with retirement and trading accounts

competitors.name: Webull
competitors.notes: Commission-free trading app competing with Robinhood

competitors.name: Interactive Brokers
competitors.notes: Broker for active traders with IBKR Lite

competitors.name: Cash App
competitors.notes: Square's app adding stock and Bitcoin trading
